about_the_game:
Re-experience the real-time strategy epic Subtension with this standalone soundtrack, composed by members of the WolverineSoft Studio.

About Subtension
Subtension was created by 40 people across two teams at the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio, a student games studio undersemester-longer long projects. It is an educational case study of Subset Game's FTL: Faster Than Light, and takes inspiration from its game mechanics as well as other games in the genre. Work on this project took place between May and December 2022.

name: Subtension Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 250 MB available space

short_description: Be transported to the submerged apocalypse of Subtension. This album contains 4 songs, remastered and polished into a complete musical package.
